title: Making an OOL Team - LF (MID) (JUNG) (SUP)  Diamond 5+
body:
I am interested in creating an OOL team aiming to improve as individual players as well as a team. The goal is to reach OCS and is possible through practicing. I used to play for a challenger ranked 5v5s team back when 5v5 was available and have not played in a team since. I have people that have played competitively at the highest levels of OCE that can help coach and mentor the team.

Requirements:
Diamond 5 minimum in solo queue.
Working Microphone 
Discord
Availability during weekdays (Mostly Afternoon)
Availability during weekends
Willingness to learn 
Can Handle criticism 
Passionate about improving as a team

IGN: Nikita 50111

replies.body: hello im on a throwaway account i can jungle quite well. ill add you and pm
